info.name: Nappsel CSS Fixes
info.description: Hey. To me, as well as to you, sometimes don't like some elements on a site and my small style just is engaged in that corrects CSS and does a site more pleasantly(removes ad blocks, aggressive content and etc). Important! This is my personal opinion and all the changes are made to own taste and color. Notice! I recommend using my styles with RU AdList CSS Fixes. Please let me know if there are annoying elements on your favorite site and standard blocking methods don't work. Also, I am a front-end developer and if you need help with your project, visit my portfolio â€“ nappsel.com :)
